implementation

Class Course

  • java.lang.Object
    • implementation.Course

  • public class Course
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a single course taken by an ACU student. Maintains data for
    • CRN (course registration number)
    • course number extension
    • course year
    • course term
    • current grade
    • whether student course is active

    Courses and CourseDescriptions will be able to reference one another through their CRNs. CourseDescription is presently capable of equating itself with a Course object by use of the default equals method.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kevin Shurtz, Virginia Pettit

    • Constructor Detail

      • Course

        public Course(int crnNum,
              java.lang.String ext,
              int year,
              Term cTerm,
              double grade,
              boolean now)
        Constructs a Course object to represent a student's course. Course delegates the instantiation of instance variables to method setCourse.
        Parameters:
        crnNum - course registration number
        ext - course number extension, such as 01, H1, etc
        year - year the course is taking place in
        cTerm - term the coures is taking place in
        grade - current grade for the course out of 100 points
        now - whether the course is being actively taken
        See Also:
        setCourse(int, String, int, Term, double, boolean)

    • Method Detail

      • setCourse

        public void setCourse(int crnNum,
                      java.lang.String ext,
                      int year,
                      Term cTerm,
                      double grade,
                      boolean now)
        Assigns values to Course instance variables. The function delegate assignment to each of the assignment functions for each instance variable, many of which validate the input.
        Parameters:
        crnNum - course registration number
        ext - course number extension, such as 01, H1, etc
        year - year the course is taking place in
        cTerm - term the coures is taking place in
        grade - current grade for the course out of 100 points
        now - whether the course is being actively taken
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If one of the arguements provided was unacceptable

      • setCourseCRN

        public void setCourseCRN(int crnNum)
        Assigns the course registration number. No validation is conducted.
        Parameters:
        crnNum - course registration number, a unique course identifier

      • setCourseNumberExt

        public void setCourseNumberExt(java.lang.String ext)
        Assigns the course number extension. Examples include '01', '02', and 'H2'. The full identifier for a course can be created by concatenating the course number with its extension, joined by a '.'. For example, 101.H1
        Parameters:
        ext - course number extension

      • setCourseYear

        public void setCourseYear(int year)
        Assigns the year in which the course is taken. Validation insures that the year is a reasonable input.
        Parameters:
        year - the year in which the course is being taken
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the year is from before 1906, more than four characters, or less than four characters

      • setCourseTerm

        public void setCourseTerm(Term cTerm)
        Assigns the term in which a course is taken. The term is represented as a Term enum, which can assume one of several predefined values. Term exists independently of the Course object.
        Parameters:
        cTerm - the term in which a course is taken
        See Also:
        Term

      • setCourseGrade

        public void setCourseGrade(double grade)
        Assigns the grade a student has in a course. The grade cannot be above a 100.0 or below a 0.0.
        Parameters:
        grade - the grade a student has in an instance of Course
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If a student is assigned a value above 100.0 or if a student is assigned a value below 0.0.

      • setInCourseNow

        public void setInCourseNow(boolean now)
        Assigns boolean regarding whether a student is actively taking the course. There is no validation that can occur in the function. This value is used to differentiate between past and current courses.
        Parameters:
        now - whether a student is actively taking the course

      • getCourseCRN

        public int getCourseCRN()
        Returns the course registration number. This can be used to look up a CourseDescription for this course.
        Returns:
        the course registration number

      • getCourseNumberExt

        public java.lang.String getCourseNumberExt()
        Returns the course number extension. Courses often have extensions for their course numbers to differentiate different instances of the course, represented by a mixture of digits and characters. Examples include '01', '02', 'H2', etc. Often, the full course identifier is presented as the subject, course number and course number extension, ajoined by a period. For example, BIBL 101.H2. At ACU, this represnts Bible 101 Jesus: Life and Teachings. The H2 signifies that this is the "Honors 2" class.
        Returns:
        the course number extension

      • getCourseYear

        public int getCourseYear()
        Returns the course year. Examples include, 2012, 2014, 2016, etc.
        Returns:
        the course year

      • getCourseTerm

        public Term getCourseTerm()
        Returns the course Term, represented by an enum. Course terms are limited in number. Thus, they have been represented as enumerated types to insure strong typing. Exmamples include FALL, SPRING, JAN_SHORT (January Short), and MAY (Maymester).
        Returns:
        the course term

      • getCourseGrade

        public double getCourseGrade()
        Returns the course grade. This represents the final grade for the course, or the ongoing grade as an active semester progresses.
        Returns:
        the course grade

      • isInCourseNow

        public boolean isInCourseNow()
        Returns whether the course is actively being taken by a student.
        Returns:
        whether the course is actively being taken by a student
